WorkItem.Description: Make a print option for a particular gear set.  Would be easier to have a formatted sheet in front of me when a particular piece pops up, so I know what my wishlist is, instead of tabbing back and forth between the game and my raid.
WorkItem.Summary: [Feature Request] Print Out of Currently Equipped Gear

Comments.Message: Agreed, or even an export feature to excell or some kind of coma or tab deliminated file for printing in 3rd party app would be great.

Simpler to export to a webpage html format and have your browser do the printing. Funny I was thinking that we needed this today but its a MASSIVE task as there is so much stuff in Rawr you might want to print.

For now simply take a screenshot of the app and print that - ie: make sure Rawr is highlighted - press Alt-Prt Scr ie: hold alt key and press Prt Scr key. Open wordpad and paste it into an empty wordpad file. Then just print from wordpad.
Also, upgrade lists already support exporting as tab delimited (I think? Might be comma, whatever), which you could print from Excel.
